website_summaries.verdict: This heater has a unique anti-freeze setting that turns the unit on when the temperature reaches 44 degrees.
pros: Extra quiet fan space heater for home or office
Adjustable thermostat with high and low settings
Operate fan without heat for summer ventilationSafe Heat thermal cut-off
Anti-freeze setting automatically turns the unit on when the temperature reaches 44 degrees Fahrenheit
cons: Small handle is difficult to grip

customer_reviews.title: Undisclosed prop 65 warning
customer_reviews.text: I looked everywhere on this items discription to see if there was a prop 65 warning. ALOT of space heaters have them. Thought i found one that didnt. Bought 2, just to open the box and find them had warnings.
customer_reviews.author: Esther and yuri

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: The heater seems to work well. I only use the low setting and haven’t had a problem with it shutting off from overheating. The one thing I was disappointed about was that it didn’t have a handle. I purchased a handle from the hardware and fixed it myself. Manufacturer take note.
customer_reviews.author: GVW

customer_reviews.title: DeLonghi Fan Heater
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing little heater. I keep it in our 3 season room, that we actually use in the winter, as well. The body doesn't get too hot, and it shuts off when tipped over. So. It is safe enough to use around my two large Alaskan Malamutes. It's extremely lightweight and has quite a low profile. I like this little heater!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Ann Woods

customer_reviews.title: This heater packs a great punch!
customer_reviews.text: This little heater packs a serious punch. It is very small and lightweight, so i was pleasantly surprised with how well it heats my master bathroom. Three walls of my bathroom have exterior facing walls so it gets pretry chilly. This little thing heats my bathroom extremely well on the lowest setting/wattage, with the temperature dial set less than halfway. I bought this to replace my 14 year old DeLonghi that finally met its maker. The old one was metal whereas the new one is plastic, so time will tell if it holds up with the same longevity.
customer_reviews.author: RobynDe

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my greenhouse!
customer_reviews.text: I just love these heaters! I use them in my small greenhouse. One is used as a fan and they other to keep the temperature up for the winter. They work great! I have a larger one I use in my home and it heats almost the whole house. Love that they have built in thermostats and auto shut off if turned over. I would not buy another brand. These are the best out there that I have found.
customer_reviews.author: T. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Effective Little Heater
customer_reviews.text: What a great high powered heater that saves money. In the cold months we just use our bedroom heaters and do not turn on the furnace. I have a Holmes 1200 watt for one bedroom and this one in mine. Both heaters heat up a whole bedroom icy cold in minutes. And it's pretty, lightweight and portable. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kat & Karen's Shared Account

customer_reviews.title: Good, warm little fan
customer_reviews.text: Overall I'm quite happy with this little fan. It works great to heat up a small space. It was slightly louder than anticipated, but not overly so and I'm used to it now. I'd give it 4.5 or maybe even 5 if it had a handle on top with which to carry it or re-position it. As it is, I have to grab it by the sides or bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Stayrook Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: Decent heater
customer_reviews.text: Relatively quiet. I use it overnight and it doesn't wake me up. It doesn't heat as well as it could, even in a modest size room with the door closed. Had a strong plastic odor during first couple times I used it, but that went away.
customer_reviews.author: Felicity

customer_reviews.title: Fine and durable
customer_reviews.text: It’s been working for a year now, so it shows how functional and durable it is, I also like the design. The one thing I wish it had is a kind of grip to make it easier when you want to move it. Although it’s light and you can move it by your hands, a grip could make it portable in a more comfortable way.
customer_reviews.author: Nin

customer_reviews.title: And I love the fact that it is a "safe heater"
customer_reviews.text: It definitely warms up my child's room during the winter. And I love the fact that it is a "safe heater". The only thing is, I found that when you turn it on and it has a little bit of a burning smell. But that eventually goes away
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Levy-Phelan

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get very hot
customer_reviews.text: This little heater doesn't get very warm. It may be defective or it could be that I have it plugged into a different voltage outlet, either way my office was still cold all winter with it running at full hot.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Never worked
customer_reviews.text: This heater has never worked consistently. Only about 20% of the time does it actually turn on and blow heat. I thought it was the weird electrical issues in my home but then took to neighbors house and same deal, it just doesn’t fully turn on. And , I can smell a heating element burning. I’m afraid it will malfunction and catch fire. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: SF

customer_reviews.title: Works great like I thought it would
customer_reviews.text: Works great like I thought it would, however, it doesn’t have a handle to pick it up with so there is not the ease of picking it up with one hand if you are moving it around, unless maybe you have bigger hands. Busy stay at home moms and dads will understand this. It’s just an extra step to have to use both hands for this little heater. Great heat output. It’s makes noise but we like that for white noise. Nice little fan, add a handle.
customer_reviews.author: CheifParent

customer_reviews.title: Good Value and Function
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful heater for small spaces. We bought two of these last Winter to spot heat selected rooms. They worked great out-of-the-box and we just purchased another one for this Winter. Not perfect -- as other reviewers have noted, the thermostat cutoff is sensitive and it's not the quietest heater -- but it's an excellent mix of form, function, and price. Don't expect to heat your entire house with one of these (unless you have a small space with moderate Winter temps) and you'll be happy with this item.
customer_reviews.author: D. Kittrell

customer_reviews.title: No  peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: What a waste of money this is it failed in the first couple of days with very light usage And the safety cut off switch keeps kicking in
customer_reviews.author: altecz44

customer_reviews.title: Nice heater. A little noisy.
customer_reviews.text: I keep this in kiddo's room just in case it's not cold enough to kick on the central heating. It's a pretty strong space heater for the room, but when it kicks on, it's kinda loud. I'm always afraid that it will wake up the baby. Fortunately it doesn't seem to right now. I would recommend this to friends with some reservations about the noise.
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: quieter than some other brands of fan/heaters I've purchased. ...
customer_reviews.text: quieter than some other brands of fan/heaters I've purchased. Does not get as hot as the others however and seems to push out less air, but does an adequate job. Doesn't really have a handle but there is a smallish lip to grab to move it. Does not vibrate on a window shelf, a problem with others I've purchased. Grill does not get hot. No tip over switch. Fan makes a slight rattle noise at times. No nasty smell when first turned on. Works well in my 12 x 10 room.
customer_reviews.author: CA

customer_reviews.title: Great little heaters
customer_reviews.text: These little heaters are great. I first bought 2 a few years ago and wound up liking them so much I bought several more. Much better and safer than the other 20 brands and models I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: drumwraith

customer_reviews.title: Turns off too often not good for me!
customer_reviews.text: I did not like that the heater turns off like every 3 minutes and then turns back on maybe five to ten minutes later all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: it worked perfectly but it was a little loud for my nighttime needs
customer_reviews.author: ultrascope

customer_reviews.title: no handle
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking heater. The fan is not very strong, so it doesn't warm up a room very fast; however, it is fairly quiet. The deal breaker for us was the supposed handle - it is just a shallow indentation in the back, and because of the width of the heater, it is not actually possible to get a grip with one hand. We move our heater around in the bathroom constantly, depending on our needs, so not being able to carry it in one hand makes this one unfit for our purposes.
customer_reviews.author: SwissAmerican

customer_reviews.title: Kid-friendly!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this with my toddler's room in mind as it's quite an old home. It works like a dream (very user-friendly, range of adjustable settings, and warms up the room quickly) and it will shut off if tipped over, which was a must-have feature for me. Being a fan heater, it is not completely quiet, but my LO doesn't mind it at all and it actually doubles as a white-noise machine at night when I turn it on. Planning on buying a second one for my room.
customer_reviews.author: A. Fawbush

customer_reviews.title: Simple and to the point.
customer_reviews.text: I like that this just a simple space heater that doesn't require a lot of knob twisting or button pressing to keep a room comfortable and warm. It's also nice to know that it's is safe to touch since it's in our kid's room.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: This works great! I previously had a foot space heater that ...
customer_reviews.text: This works great! I previously had a foot space heater that got hot that my toddler would play with the buttons. This is great to set on a counter higher up where he doesn't notice it. It doesn't get hot to touch but heats up the room nicely and you can set it to a specific temp. I wish it had temperature markings on there because you just have to turn it on until it gets to the temp you like and then set it but very worth it, and can't beat the cost
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Heater for use with a baby
customer_reviews.text: Works great, does not get hot to the touch, but does blow hot air. Works well to keep our baby warm at night and during bath time. We use it all over the house and it even heats our big bedroom very nicely. Temperature gauge isn't labeled but we have no problem adjusting it to how we feel. Of course we do not let our baby play with the heater while it is on or off. We do set it on the floor and on furniture up high. It does a good job both places.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Feeling the Cold at the Front Desk?
customer_reviews.text: Quiet and ideal for confined areas such as under a desk.
customer_reviews.author: Daragh H.

customer_reviews.title: Not Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Dont buy this product. it stoped working in just 4 weeks
customer_reviews.author: AMAzing

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it is supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: I have this product for a few months now. I bought it to warm up my basement so my toddler son and I would no longer freeze. I bought this space heater because I wanted one that works, not too expensive, and is safe for a toddler. You can have the heater running for a lengthy period of time and it remains safe to touch. Takes a bit longer to heat up a room than others I am sure, but I am happy with this heater because safety is my top concern
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Kass

customer_reviews.title: Does what I need it to do at the office
customer_reviews.text: Needed a unit for work. They are trying to save too much by skimping on the heat. Fingers and toes cold. Go home and never recover. Brought this in. It is not going to win any awards for being the quietest or most soothing sound while running. But it does work. The thermostat works, high and low works. Everyone felt better and I can hide it. The orange is really orange, more so than the stock picture.
customer_reviews.author: Voltaire

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I actually use this little heater for our bedroom which is fairly large to help keep it warm for our little one. It works great! Sometimes I even wake up and turn it off because I am too hot! It is small but powerful and quiet which is a plus. I also have a fan in the room to help circulate the air and heat and I think that definitely helps!
customer_reviews.author: 05red24

customer_reviews.title: perfect for a child's room
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT for a child's room. We have had one in my daughters room for 2.5 years now and just purchased a second one for our guest bedroom we loved it so much. The best feature is that it stays cool to the touch on the face of the fan. In the summer time it works as a fan and in the winter it works as a heater. You set it to the temperature you want and you are set to go with no worries. I've recommended it to all my momma friends!
customer_reviews.author: danyel

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one month
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this heater in my nursery to keep the room at 70. The thermostat setting no longer works. The heater still functions but it needs to be blowing all the time making the room too hot. I would not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Vtrunner

customer_reviews.title: Safe and great control settings
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a long time back, but it still works good as new. Bought it when our daughter was a baby and it was too cold in her room during the winter. I love the temperature control settings. The size is perfect and it’s very safe.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Carroll

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. I have a 1 year old who likes to get into everything and this is perfect for his little wandering fingers. It does not get hot at all. It can sit right next to him as he plays on the floor. The only reason that I didn't give it five stars is because it doesn't heat as much of the room as I would like. I put it right next to our patio door since that is where my son likes to play all the time and it works great there, but doesn't warm much further that where it sits.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty
customer_reviews.text: We have only used it one night so far, but it does it's job. I had it on the highest temperature setting and within 2 hours the room was overly hot. Perfect for my son's room to take the chill out of the air. I think he even slept better too!
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Brown

customer_reviews.title: Not a blazing inferno
customer_reviews.text: This little heater will warm your feet, but don't expect it to heat the room. But here in So Cal, feet warming is all that I needed, so it's good enough. As other reviewers have noted, there's no handle, so you have to grab the body of it or pick it up by the knobs. Any indentation could have sufficed for a handle, I don't know why they didn't bother to create one.
customer_reviews.author: astraycat

customer_reviews.title: Save for nursery
customer_reviews.text: I love the face that I do not have to worry about my son getting burned by this heater, although I still tell him that it is something hot and that he should not play with it. The only thing about it that needs improvement is the thermostat. I have not been using that a lot, because it tends to make the room too warm. Seems like you have to calibrate it every time. I will definitely try it out more when winter comes though and see how it goes. Otherwise, this is a nifty little heater!
customer_reviews.author: SonjaT

customer_reviews.title: Good for small/medium spaces
customer_reviews.text: This has proven to be an excellent heater for our little guy's room (and our office, as well). Out of curiosity we did tip it over to see if it would automatically shut off (a safety feature we had assumed it possessed) but it remained on. This was disappointing but since the heater remains cool to the touch and we will not be letting our LO near it anyway that's OK.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Reinhard

customer_reviews.title: Small but powerful heater
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly, this little heater makes a big difference in our home! We needed a heater to help compensate for drafty windows in our bedroom, and this does the trick. It is cool to the touch, but puts out enough warm/hot air to take the chill out of the air at night.
customer_reviews.author: A. Moore

customer_reviews.title: The fan is pretty loud, but gives good white noise
customer_reviews.text: This heater puts out a lot of heat quickly, but the thermostat prevents the room from overheating. The fan is pretty loud, but gives good white noise. For it's size and price, it's a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Andy Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We had a previous heater that was the same model and brand and it broke after 4 years, so we decided to replace it! Haha awesome product and it doesn’t get too hot so you can keep your feet closer to it without getting burned.
customer_reviews.author: Christiane Noriega

customer_reviews.title: Great little heater
customer_reviews.text: Great little heater. I bought it for the auto shut off feature when an object covers it, such as a shirt, because it is being used in a kids room. Auto shut off works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Great little heater
customer_reviews.text: This heater is very portable, puts out a wide range of heat, and is only slightly warm to the touch. Highly recommend this heater!
customer_reviews.author: shortan

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Heats up my little room pretty quick, it did produce a smell for awhile but it's gone away now. The little thermostat makes it much easier to use, keep your room nice and warm without getting too hot and save energy.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Eli

customer_reviews.title: safe and efficient
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because it was rated by Real Simple as the safest space heater. When our old one broke this is what we ordered. I thought it was a bit more than what I wanted to pay, however was sold on the safety of it. Our family has loved having this in our bathroom. It heats our small bathroom very nicely and it is safe to the touch. I never have to worry about my son touching it or bumping into it. Very pleased with this heater! Worth the little bit of extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh C.

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised and very attractive too!
customer_reviews.text: I love the color, the size, and the performance of this space heater. It isn’t too noisy, the auto turn off feature works as expected and it keeps me warm!
customer_reviews.author: EastCoastJetski

customer_reviews.title: I like this heater
customer_reviews.text: I like this heater, but i do not like thay it shuts off when it gets to a certain degree. I have it under my desk in a small place so it goes then shuts off after a couple mins and comes on like 15 min later. But in the mean time my feet are cold.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: this made a slight noise and didnt warm my bathroom. returned.
customer_reviews.author: chany

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for chilly bedroom.
customer_reviews.text: Our son's bedroom is 6 degrees colder with the door closed and with pets it has to be closed at night. This little heater is perfect, it heats the room up quick and I feel safe having it in their with its features and design.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra M Cornett

customer_reviews.title: JUNK - Blows Warm Air
customer_reviews.text: I liked the design and color, but this heater didn't get hot enough to warm my 10 x 10 bedroom. I'm not sure if I got a defective item or just a pos. I'll be returning this unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: BEAR

customer_reviews.title: the worst!!! It doesn't get hot
customer_reviews.text: This is probably one of the worst space heaters ever! It does not get hot enough. I feel like the hottest temp it gets to is 65-70 degrees. I didn't believe the review I read about it not getting hot. :( I have to buy another one because I threw the box out and can't return this one
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Great/Safe Heater!
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with this heater. We wanted a heater that worked well, was small, and did not get hot to the touch. This one foots the bill! It easily heats up our main living room which is about 14x14 and has hallways to the bedrooms and kitchen. It is extremely safe. We have 3 small children I have no fear of them being around it.
customer_reviews.author: kristin

customer_reviews.title: Good little heater
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little heater for small spaces. My only hangup is it turns off about every few minutes and there is no way to have it always on. Otherwise it does a good job
customer_reviews.author: Honest Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you're a light sleeper!
customer_reviews.text: It is rather loud compared to my last unit. I prefer my old Vornado unit which worked wonderfully during peak winter months in a very drafty room. The Vornado died after 1 1/2 years. This unit only does ok at best and I am not getting as much heat peripherally. Miss my Vornado. Would not recommend. Better off with a quiet blanket!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great heater for kids room
customer_reviews.text: We have had these for a few years now. great item and works great as a way to save on energy costs in the winters time. they do not get too hot and are perfect for our two boys rooms, nice to have the room heated without worrying about them getting hurt from touching it.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job warming up my drafty bathroom on campus cold nights/days.
customer_reviews.author: Kris M.

customer_reviews.title: This little machine has been working great. We have a medium sized room with a ...
customer_reviews.text: This little machine has been working great. We have a medium sized room with a high ceiling. It heats the room with no problem and it's super quiet. I was worried that my room was too big for the heater, but it does a great job. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah C. J.

customer_reviews.title: Great for smaller rooms
customer_reviews.text: Does a fantastic job heating up a small room. Very simple to use and store, and not too bulky or heavy. It doesn't have many features (timer, precise temperature setting) but for the price, size , and efficiency, I'd say this is an excellent little buy.
customer_reviews.author: Aura

customer_reviews.title: Good basic heater for the price
customer_reviews.text: We bought this heater for our 4 year old son's room. Naturally, we were concerned about the safety of any heater we bought. We saw a few flat ones, but didn't want to go through the hassle of installing it on the wall and they came with a price tag. This heater does the job we needed it to- it has a thermostat so it kicks in for a few minutes when the room gets chilly. The front has posed no danger to our son since he can't get his fingers in there. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: The DeLonghi was simple and works great. Keeps our nursery warm without getting too hot ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this heater at the same time as the Vornadobaby Sunny for half of the price. While the Vornadobaby Sunny looks nicer and has fancier packaging, it never worked! The DeLonghi was simple and works great. Keeps our nursery warm without getting too hot and while it isn't "beautiful," it isn't an eyesore either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He says it gets warm enough but the older model we had did a better job.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husbands bathroom in the basement, we live in Michigan and it gets very cold down there. He says it gets warm enough but the older model we had did a better job.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Stays cool while it heats up your room
customer_reviews.text: This heater remains cool to the touch but has managed to keep our entire basement playroom nice and toasty. The plastic shell is easy to dust off as needed. Sleek and modern design.
customer_reviews.author: Sing Chan

customer_reviews.title: Safe switch
customer_reviews.text: Need to add safe switch so it stops running if not verticaly. Otherwise, probably excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Denis Dragovic

customer_reviews.title: Makes for pleasant bath times
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this little heater for my disabled dad who complained his bath times were uncomfortably cold. This heater is ideal for small, enclosed rooms. It produces a good amount of heat for its size but not to the point where its overwhelming warm and you feel like you are going to pass out. Another great thing about this heater is its cool to the touch during or after use.
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: would definitely recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: quickly heated an 18' by 11' room with 2 exterior walls. very quiet, very efficient. still awaiting electric bill so unknown what it costs to run, but based on results, would definitely recommend this product..
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for winter months
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for winter months. I was nervous about safety rating and fire hazard- but my fears were calmed once he product arrived and I saw how well it was built.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B.

customer_reviews.title: Great space heater!
customer_reviews.text: This space heater works! It heats up an entire room in apartment in just a few minutes. I also like that it can be used as a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca O.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Heats up my small sunroom very well. Must be because it has a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Cristi

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Small compact but also works great. For the money you can’t beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Works exceedingly well. Use in small bedroom and boy ...
customer_reviews.text: Works exceedingly well. Use in small bedroom and boy did it heat up that room. So well we had to turn it off and let some cold air back in. It's a little workhorse for sure
customer_reviews.author: homespundiva

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this heater for my enclosed 8ft porch...small and convenient, it quietly heats up the space rather quickly. With 2 small kids at home, I appreciate that it's safety features knowing my kids will not be injured. Extremely happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Edna R.

customer_reviews.title: Great little heater!
customer_reviews.text: We have used this for a couple of months and it has worked great so far. I like that it comes in a selection of colors and is fairly quiet. Most DeLonghi products have held up very well for us. We use this heater in a fairly small office and works great!
customer_reviews.author: KatCrz

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great heater for a baby/kid room! We have one in each
customer_reviews.author: Tarisha

customer_reviews.title: I love this for my son's nursery
customer_reviews.text: I love this for my son's nursery. The best feature is that you can set your desired temperature and leave it on, and the heater will only run when the room dips below the set temperature, then cut back off when the room warms up. The safety features make me feel more comfortable with it running in the baby's room!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Distributes heat really well.
customer_reviews.text: Oh boy do I love this heater, distributes heat so well and evenly, unlike many other heaters we’ve had. Worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Baby Poop

customer_reviews.title: Tipping Shut Off Malfunction
customer_reviews.text: We just got this in the mail today. While it heats well, it really does not shut off when tipped over! This makes it unsafe to keep in a baby's room... Or any room for that matter.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Eldridge

customer_reviews.title: Great heater! Great for use around kids!
customer_reviews.text: Our nursery has a large window and gets a bit chilly for our baby. I ordered this heater after reading about its safety features and performance and I couldn't be more pleased. We've had this heater since he was a newborn (he's 4 months now). It keeps the room toasty warm and the plastic grille is cool to the touch so we won't have to worry about burns when he's older. I also like the thermostat feature which allows the heater to turn off and on to maintain a temperature you select. Great product and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: CBmom

customer_reviews.title: Wish it had a better handle to move
customer_reviews.text: heats great-I use it to warm bathroom before shower. Wish it had a better handle to move it
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: Child safe as advertised! I put a shirt over the heater and it shut itself off. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Doerr

customer_reviews.title: Not a good brand
customer_reviews.text: I want to return this product so bad. It just shuts off constantly and was not what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Tammi N

customer_reviews.title: Warm feet.
customer_reviews.text: Love that the heat is blown lower to the ground to hit my feet. So many of the new ones blow higher so still cold feet! 😁
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: Small and efficient
customer_reviews.text: Work wells to take the chill out of a cold room. The controls are easy to use and I like that it turns itself on as needed. It's a small unit so it doesn't take up much room, but it did does a good job of warming up an average size bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Skriba

customer_reviews.title: works great as a bathroom heater attached to a smart switch
customer_reviews.text: Basic heater, works great as a bathroom heater attached to a smart switch.
customer_reviews.author: C. M.

customer_reviews.title: Good heater, sometimes not warm enough
customer_reviews.text: I love the small size of this heater! The auto temp control works great. The fan really gets the air moving through my apartment nicely which is great because it is my only heat source during the winter. The fan is also really quiet which is ideal. It does take about five minutes to really heat up, and even then is not as hot as I would like if I want to sit in front of it to get warm when I get home. That being said, it really can keep my two bedroom apartment the right temperature, it just takes about a half hour for it to get there if it hasn't been on in a couple hours.
customer_reviews.author: KPerry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great... I always read reviews on many different models before making a purchase. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Mark in SD

customer_reviews.title: Takes power like a siv
customer_reviews.text: Keeps you warm. Works well. Takes power like a siv!!!
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Dislike
customer_reviews.text: Not as quiet as it claims, the recess for the "handle" is very slight so it's hard to carry and it will shut itself off even if you have the thermostat at the maximum setting. I don't want my heater to tell me when the room is warm. I want to tell it to let me stay hot, darn it.
customer_reviews.author: Muffin

customer_reviews.title: Using for bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Fine for bathroom. Goes off and on quite a bit. Don't expect it to heat more than a small room.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: heater constantly shuts off
customer_reviews.text: heater only stays on for a few minutes before shutting off, it's so annoying!!!
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a little over three months ago. Heating element broke and is now just a very low powered fan.
customer_reviews.author: asb713

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Make a funky noise when starting. Level one heat does okay after the room is warm.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great for the office to keep you warm
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my office is extremely cold. This is perfect size for a small office. It also serves as a fan during the summer season. Good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Y.

customer_reviews.title: Great little heater
customer_reviews.text: This works great and I don't have to worry about my son near it. Lightweight yet puts out a good amount of heat. Good price. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: K. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my heater especially at night! It's being used in my bedroom!!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Cascino

customer_reviews.title: Good little heater
customer_reviews.text: Heats up a 10x13 room very nicely. I especially like that the front doesn't get hot as this is for my daughters room. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Walker

customer_reviews.title: ... set at an actual temperature which i think is nice - this one is a little difficult with just ...
customer_reviews.text: I have another fan that you can set at an actual temperature which i think is nice - this one is a little difficult with just a turn dial to get a good temp
customer_reviews.author: Liz Joy

customer_reviews.title: don't recommend to buy
customer_reviews.text: Turns off too quickly, never on for more than 2 minutes at a time. It defeats the purpose! So, no go, don't recommend to buy.
customer_reviews.author: axel brodermann

customer_reviews.title: Weak heat!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't put out enough heat. You can barely feel it no matter what setting on. Not worth the $$
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: and we are very happy with this solution
customer_reviews.text: Hi All, we recently purchased these heaters for the office, and we are very happy with this solution. Before the landlord's heating season kicks in we were able to stay warm and comfortable in our offices during the weather fluctuation. They turn off once the room temperature is high enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for rooms under 20x20
customer_reviews.text: Little bit of an energy hog, but keep the room mostly closed off and it'll feel like summer
customer_reviews.author: Chris

product_meta.title: De'Longhi Portable Fan Heater, Quiet 1500W, 2 Heat Settings, Energy Saving, Overheat Protection, Compact & Ideal for Small to Medium Sized Rooms, Blue, HVY1030BL
product_meta.description: Color:BlueThis compact fan heater by De'Longhi is perfect for any home or office application. It is ideal for use as supplementary or spot heating in the bedroom, living room, office or anywhere in the home. You can customize your heating needs with the adjustable thermostat and two heat settings; choose the high setting for 1500 watts or the low setting for 750 watts. Its versatility will save you money; use the heater year-round by operating the fan without heat for summer ventilation. You can rest easy knowing that this heater has a thermal cut-off, so it doesn’t overheat, an anti-freeze setting, wide solid base for stability and power indicator light. It also has a convenient carry handle for easy transport. Available in multiple colors.
feature_bullets: INSTANT WARMTH: Packs 1500 watts of power for instant personal heating
PEACE OF MIND: Features a thermal shutoff to prevent overheating and an internal tip-over switch that automatically turns the unit off if it falls over
PERSONALIZED COMFORT: Customize your heating needs with the adjustable thermostat and multiple heat settings
WARMTH WHERE YOU WANT IT: Lightweight, compact, portable unit with convenient carrying handle lets you enjoy the comfort of personal warmth wherever you need it to go

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
